ConnectionHandler module¶

class ConnectionHandler.ConnectionHandler(username, portp2p, Log, Chat, Message, Security)¶

Bases: threading.Thread

Handles all the connection received from the other peers and handles all the packets received from them

BUFFER_SIZE = 2048¶
onlineKeyExchangeProtocolReceiver(conn)¶

Implements the Online Key Exchange Protocol for the receiver peer

Parameters:conn (Socket) – the socket used for the message exchange
Return type:String or Int
Returns:the username of the peer with which the conneciton has been established or an error code
receiveMessage(conn)¶

Handle the connection with a the user connected to the socket passed as param conn. Call the Online Key Exchange Protocol as the peer receiving the connection

Parameters:conn (Socket) – the socket used for the communication with the peer
run()¶

Accept new connections with other clients and starts a new thread that will handle the single connection

stop()¶

Close the p2p socket
